description: Students continue developing proficiency in spoken and written Norwegian, increasing their vocabulary, improving grammatical accuracy, and gaining experience reading and listening to authentic materials. Prerequisite: Norwegian 111 or equivalent. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
name: Begin Norwegian II
prerequisites: Norwegian 111 or equivalent. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
